feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 9:03PM AKST until December 14 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Additional snow accumulations of one inch. Winds gusting to 35 mph. Visibility as low as one half mile at times. Wind chills to 40 below.
entry.cap:areaDesc: South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range

entry.summary: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THURSDAY TO 9 AM AKST FRIDAY FOR THE KUSKOKWIM DELTA COAST... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. entry.cap:areaDesc: Kuskokwim Delta

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 3:02PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...STORM FORCE FRONT MOVES IN WEDNESDAY NIGHT INTO THURSDAY NIGHT... The second in a series of strong fronts moves over the AK Gulf then into the Panhandle Wednesday evening into Thursday night. While this fast moving system will bring in periods of heavy precipitation and strong winds it is not expected to be as severe
entry.cap:areaDesc: Admiralty Island; Annette Island; Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Wrangell; City and Borough of Yakutat; City of Hyder; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Petersburg Borough; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island

entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 3:00PM AKST until December 14 at 11:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...LONG DURATION HEAVY SNOW EVENT FOR THE HAINES AND KLONDIKE HIGHWAYS WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY NIGHT... .A wave of moisture moving through the northern panhandle will bring moderate to heavy snow for the Haines and Klondike Highways. A period of snow near sea level for Haines and Skagway begins late Wednesday night and lasting through Thursday morning.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 10:08PM MST until December 14 at 5:00AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: .Freezing rain has changed to light snow generally along and west of Highway 27 in northwest Kansas and all of northeast Colorado. Mixed wintry precipitation continues east to Highway 83, but may also change to snow during the overnight hours. Freezing fog is no longer a hazard, but visibility reductions to as low as a mile will occur in the light snow.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 11:08PM CST until December 14 at 6:00AM CST by NWS
entry.summary: .Freezing rain has changed to light snow generally along and west of Highway 27 in northwest Kansas and all of northeast Colorado. Mixed wintry precipitation continues east to Highway 83, but may also change to snow during the overnight hours. Freezing fog is no longer a hazard, but visibility reductions to as low as a mile will occur in the light snow.
